title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 July 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:03 <pgmjsd> has left #xwiki  
00:58 <sburjan> has quit  
01:10 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
04:35 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
04:35 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
04:35 <vmassol> has quit  
05:07 <vmassol1> has quit  
07:56 <sburjan> has quit  
11:24 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
11:44 <tekzilla> has quit  
11:45 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
17:52 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
18:21 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
19:48 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
19:51 <@cjd> sorry I didn't get to say goodbye to you, I'll see you next year if not sooner..  
19:52 <@sdumitriu> Sure cjd, no problem  
19:58 <cinux> has joined #xwiki  
19:59 <cinux> hey, i have a problem, xwiki cant be deployed. i dont know why. i use tomcat6 and debian. can somebody help me? i search since over 10 hours :(  
20:00 <@cjd> do you have any logs with errors in them?  
20:00 <cinux> of course enough :D wait a secound :)  
20:05 <cinux> cjd: http://pastebin.com/uZ2fB623 at the moment is no .war file in the folder webapps so tomcat6 start without some problems.  
20:06 <@cjd> just a wild guess but it looks like the user which toncat is running as can't read the tomcat directories  
20:07 <@cjd> check your file permissions  
20:07 <@cjd> I'll be back in a little while.  
20:15 <cinux> i have do "chown /var/lib/tomcat6" but nothing help.. :-/  
20:17 <cinux> http://pastebin.com/MXrAS5gv what is with the exception?  
20:34 <@cjd> chown tomcat6 /var/lib/tomcat6 -R  
20:41 <cinux> has quit  
20:42 <cinux> has joined #xwiki  
20:42 <cinux> cjd: this will not solve the problem i got the same exception :(  
20:48 <+sburjan`> cjd, sdumitriu: sorry for not saying good bye also !  
20:50 <@cjd> cinux: does tomcat run without xwiki?  
20:58 <cinux> cjd: yes, when i delet the xwiki folder an the xwiki.war from the folder webapps and restart the server then tomcat run perfekt  
20:59 <@cjd> try keeping the folder but removing the .war file  
21:12 <ries> has quit  
21:34 <sdumitriu> has quit  
21:41 <cjd> has quit  
23:21 <ries> has joined #xwiki  
23:37 <cinux> has quit
